full_summary:
**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

**Notice Title:** Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) 
**Solicitation Number:** 100022520
**Reference Number:** CB-661-79301894

**Amendment Information:**

* Amendment 7: Extends closing date to January 19, 2024 at 14:00 EST and includes Q&A 1-35
* Amendment 6: Extends closing date to January 5, 2024 at 14:00 EST and includes Q&A 1-15


**Procurement Overview:**

The Internal Audit and Enterprise Risk Management Branch (IAERMB) of Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) is seeking the services of a Task-Based Informatics Professional to assess the IT security mechanisms within the department.

**Technical Specifications:**

The IAERMB requires professionals with expertise in IT security, specifically in the areas of:
* C.6. Information Technology Security Engineer
* C.11. Information Technology Security Vulnerability Analysis Specialist

**Contract Details:**

* Contract Type: Task-Based Informatics Professional Services
* Estimated Contract Start Date: February 1, 2024
* Estimated Contract End Date: March 31, 2025
* Contracting Entity: Employment and Social Development Canada
* Location: National Capital Region (NCR), Quebec, Canada

**Selection Criteria:**

* Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Tendering Method:**
Competitive - Selective Tendering

**Contact Information:**

* Maxime Dubé, nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca, 000000000

**Attachments:**

* English Version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25861/100022520-tbips-npp-en.pdf
* French Version: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25861/100022520-tbips-npp-fr.pdf

**Note:** This procurement is set aside for Indigenous business under the federal government Set-aside Program for Indigenous Business. GSIN: D302A ADP SYSTEM DEVELOPMENT SERVICES.
